category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_remove_file_on_check_in
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the system has to delete the exported files in the OS while performing a Check-in on a dataset which has been checked-out with "Export" option. This preference is also used to determine if the exported files in the OS should be deleted if the user cancels the Check-Out. Valid values are 0/1. 0 - Do not remove the exported OS files on Check-In. 1 - Remove the exported OS files on Check-In.
